blogPost.excerpt: Our serverless Kubernetes platform is designed for the needs of fast moving development teams who want to focus on delivering applications, not operations.
blogPost.body: Our serverless Kubernetes platform is designed for the needs of fast moving development teams who want to focus on delivering applications, not operations.
blogPost.title: CTO.ai 2.0 - A smarter workflow for Cloud Native apps
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 我们的无服务器Kubernetes平台是为了满足快速发展的开发团队的需求而设计的，他们希望专注于交付应用程序，而不是操作。
localize.tagline: 为云原生应用提供更智能的工作流程

localize.description: 我們的無服務器Kubernetes平臺是爲了滿足快速發展的開發團隊的需求而設計的，他們希望專注於交付應用程序，而不是操作。
localize.tagline: 爲雲原生應用提供更智能的工作流程

previous.excerpt: ReWrap your Spotify Wrapped to discover artists you’ve never heard of based on the sound of songs you already listen to. Powered by the Andrson algorithm, trained on over 200 hours of music.
previous.title: ReWrapped - Sound-driven music discovery

localize.description: 重新包装你的Spotify Wrapped，根据你已经听过的歌曲的声音来发现你从未听过的艺术家。由Andrson算法提供支持，对200多个小时的音乐进行训练。
重新包裝你的Spotify Wrapped，根據你已經聽過的歌曲的聲音來發現你從未聽過的藝術家。由Andrson算法提供支持，對200多個小時的音樂進行訓練。

next.excerpt: I was getting tired of waiting for uploads to convert mywebm files tomp4 files. That's why I made WEBM To MP4! There's no ads, no uploads, and no watermarks. Just select your local file, convert, & download! 🤯
